coupon_title: Nations Trust Bank Diners Club card Offers - Bentota

marks.terms:
Unless otherwise stated above, for this offer to be valid, the cardmember shall:
(1) pay with a Diners Club or any card within the partner network which is mutually agreed upon, in writing by the parties;
(2) show the offer in print or mobile phone; and
(3) if explicitly required by the merchant, enter the promotional code if purchasing online.
Only one offer per cardmember can be used and cannot be combined with any other offer, unless otherwise stated. This offer is non-refundable, transferable and carries no monetary alternative.
marks.name: Diners Club Acceptance Mark

offer_settings.terms: <p>1) The promotion is valid for bookings made &#038; stays confirmed during specified periods (inclusive of days mentioned). 2) Rooms will be given on a first come first served basis, strictly subject to availability &#038; confirmation. 3) Reservations to be made in advance by calling the specified numbers. An advance payment is to be made by the Card member using his/her Diner Club Card at the time of the reservation. 4) The savings is not applicable for pre confirmed bookings made prior to the respective launch dates. 5) Standard Child Policy, Cancellation policy &#038; Peak Supplements of the Properties will continue to apply. 6) The type of rooms available (Double/Triple) and the basis on which it is offered (HB/FB) will be in accordance with the standard policy of the individual property. &#038; General Terms &#038; Conditions</p>
